main event: A civilian observed one then two unidentified objects in Truth or Consequences, New Mexico on April 16, 1966.
interesting points: The primary object was described as being 30 feet long and 10 feet high, The object hovered before rising and moving toward the southeast, The sighting lasted for 15 minutes, The object made no sound during the observation, The observer reported the object to the Air Force, and additional information was provided in a questionnaire.
sighted object: one then two oval-shaped unidentified objects
location: Truth or Consequences, New Mexico, USA
witness description: Civilian, provided detailed account of the sighting.
